required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Somofilcon A 1-Day Multifocal Study - Real World Subjective Acceptance Study
clinical_study.official_title: Clariti 1-Day Multifocal Study - 'Real World' Subjective Acceptance Study (HARP)

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the study is to evaluate the performance of somofilcon A 1 day multifocal when worn on a daily disposable wear modality over a period of up to 3 weeks.

secondary_outcome.description: Satisfaction of distance vision while driving (fell short of expectation, met expectation, exceed expectation)
Satisfaction of distance vision while viewing TV (fell short of expectation, met expectation, exceed expectation)
Satisfaction of intermediate vision while using desktop computer (fell short of expectation, met expectation, exceed expectation)
Satisfaction of short/intermediate vision while using laptop/tablet (fell short of expectation, met expectation, exceed expectation)

secondary_outcome.measure: Vision satisfaction - Reading on cell phone
secondary_outcome.description: Satisfaction of near vision while reading on cell phone (fell short of expectation, met expectation, exceed expectation)
Satisfaction of near vision while reading hand-held printed materials (fell short of expectation, met expectation, exceed expectation)
Subjective rating of comfort (fell short of expectation, met expectation, exceed expectation)
Distance visual acuity (logMAR)
Lens centration on the cornea (Optimum, Acceptable decentration, Unacceptable decentration (>=0.5mm))
Movement of lens on eye after blink (Scale 0-4: 0=Insufficient, 2=Optimal, 4=Excessive)
Grading redness of bulbar conjunctiva (Scale 0-4: 0=None, 4=Severe)
Corneal staining in superior region
Corneal staining in temporal region
Corneal staining in nasal region
Corneal staining in inferior region
Corneal staining in central region
Conjunctival staining in central region
Conjunctival staining in superior region
Conjunctival staining in temporal region
Conjunctival staining in nasal region
Conjunctival staining in inferior region
Rating how easy lens was inserted on eye (Fell short of expectation, Met expectation, Exceeded expectations)
Rating how easy lens was removed from eye (Fell short of expectation, Met expectation, Exceeded expectations)
Vision clarity rating for all visual needs (Fell short of expectation, Met expectation, Exceeded expectations)

secondary_outcome.measure: Satisfaction with speed of changing focus
secondary_outcome.description: Rating for speed and ability to change focus between distances (Fell short of expectation, Met expectation, Exceeded expectations)

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall preference between study and habitual contact lenses
secondary_outcome.description: Preference of contact lens for the whole range of tasks (Prefer strongly, Prefer slightly, No preference)

secondary_outcome.measure: Preference between study and habitual contact lenses for lifestyle
secondary_outcome.description: Preference of contact lens for the whole range of tasks (Prefer strongly, Prefer slightly, No preference)

arm_group.description: Habitual wearers of multifocal contact lenses will be refit to somofilcon A multifocal lens and provide a subjective assessment.

facility.name: Center for Contact Lens Research, University of Waterloo
